YukariProvide.line:04e7520: "I've been burning the midnight oil recently, there are dark circles under my eyes."
YukariProvide.line:049c1f2: [Gift] Give <h>Eye Cream From the Outside World</h>, gain <h>Border Sensor</h>.

Debut.line:06f5f1b:
"Feel free to take anything you need."
Choose one Advantage (Passing the Bamboo Forest will bring additional options).
Debut.line:0f87a81: [Swap] Lose starting Exhibit and gain a random Shining Exhibit.
Debut.line:05100b8: [Recall] From 3 random Uncommon cards, choose one to add to the library.
Debut.line:097011d: [Enlighten] Add a random Rare card to the library.
Debut.line:02cfa2c: [Trade] Lose all money, gain a random Rare Exhibit.
Debut.line:0b72af3: [Relieve] Choose a card from the library to remove.
Debut.line:067ea40: [Alter] Choose a card from the library to transform.
Debut.line:0e0ea19:
"Here's some medicine I've carefully prepared."
Take a Pill.
Debut.line:0e2540a:
"For the success of the mission, take an item to your liking."
Choose one Secret Treasure (Easy Difficulty extra bonus).

Select.line:005887b:
Who do you think might have a clue to the culprit?

Choose your opponent, she will become the boss of the first act.
